#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<ctime>
#define eraseall(a) memset(a,0,sizeof(a))
#define DEBUG PVSM

int main()
{
     #ifndef DEBUG
       freopen("IO/input.txt", "r", stdin);
     #endif

     int i,T;
     char str[50];
     scanf("%d",&T);


     while(T--)
     {
        int Ans,N,P;

        scanf("%d",&N);
        scanf("%s",str);
        scanf("%d",&P);

        if(str[0]=='o' || str[0] =='O')
        {
            Ans = 2+(P-1)*2;
        }
        else if(str[0]=='e' || str[0]=='E')
        {
            Ans = 1+(P-1)*2;
        }

        printf("%d",Ans);

        if(T) printf("\n");

     }


     #ifndef DEBUG
        fprintf(stdout,"\nTIME: %lf sec\n", (double)clock()/(CLOCKS_PER_SEC));
     #endif

      return 0;
}
